articles.title: Biggest winter storm in over a decade forecast to hit tens of millions of Americans - BBC.com
articles.description: The severe weather, spanning from the Midwest to Washington DC, is a "potential disaster", says one forecaster.
articles.content:
Tens of millions of Americans are bracing for a huge winter storm that could bring the heaviest snowfall and coldest temperatures in over a decade.
The storm, which started in the middle of the US, … [+2046 chars]
